message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"here; this place","sentence":"他们在这里。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a group of people standing together in a simple setting, looking content and relaxed, with a clear indicator that they are in the present location ('here'), such as a sign in Chinese characters reading '这里', amidst gentle ruined backgrounds and warm, soft lighting.","sentence_translation":"They are here."}
